name: The X-Files: The Complete Seventh Season (Widescreen)

reviews.name: The X-Files: The Complete Seventh Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText:
This review includes seasons 5 through 7. I enjoyed X Files. For the most part, each episode stood alone. As a result, there was story completion without interruption.

The series resembled the 1958 Mickey Spillane Mike Hammer and 1974 Kolchak - The Night Stalker television series staring Darrin McGavin.

Acting, scripts, and music were better than the majority of broadcast television drama today.

In addition, DVD picture quality was good but nothing to brag about. However, many of the indoor scenes were overly dark. I suppose darkness was intended for scary atmosphere purposes.

Overall, the product was worth its price.
reviews.title: X Files (Seasons 5-7) Entertaining

reviews.name: The X-Files: The Complete Seventh Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Any X-Files fan will appreciate this dvd. The entire series is a must at any price.
reviews.title: 19 August 2007

reviews.name: The X-Files: The Complete Seventh Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText:
Great price on the dvd, and it arrived in a timely manner.

You gotta love X Files, it's my favorite show and I working on owing the entire series. Need 8 & 9 to complete.
reviews.title: Entire Series

reviews.name: The X-Files: The Complete Seventh Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: While I enjoy all seasons of The X-Files, season 7 is by far my favorite. The season is a must have for any X-Files fan and worth every penny!
reviews.title: A Must Have!

reviews.name: The X-Files: The Complete Seventh Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: IF YOU EVEN JUST LIKE THE X FILES, YOU WILL LOVE THIS DVD..MULDER IS EASY ON EYES AND SCULLY IS SASSY..THE TWO GO GREAT TOGETHER. YOU DEFINATLY NEED THIS DVD FOR YOUR COLLECTION..
reviews.title: 10 September 2007
